TEXT.S:
Al Attles
siwkay niza Al Attles (11 a bulad 7 a demiad, 1936 a mihcan), tatama, lumeniay a tademaw. miunduay, u kanas-mali a mimaliay nu Amilika NBA. matenes ciniza mikawaw i Cinco Talul putiput. u pahanhanan tu kawaway a mimaliay atu saydang ciniza. namaala ku Suoseciniza.
u sulit nu Hulam atu Amilika ·· Alvin Austin Attles Jr. is an American retired professional basketball player and coach best known for his longtime association with the Golden State Warriors.
kakuniza kalunasulitan-sulu
